mapper.select: SELECT username, password, enabled, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, credentials_non_expired, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT authority FROM authorities WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, enabled, account_non_expired, account_non_locked, credentials_non_expired, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{accountNonExpired}, #{accountNonLocked}, #{credentialsNonExpired}, now())
INSERT INTO authorities (username, authority, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{authority}, now())
